alert.note: Alert for Bolivar Peninsula; Brazoria Islands; Coastal Brazoria; Coastal Galveston; Coastal Matagorda; Galveston Island; Inland Brazoria; Inland Galveston; Matagorda Islands (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 25 at 3:24AM CDT by NWS Houston - Galveston
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of Galveston, eastern Brazoria, Chambers, east central Matagorda, southern Liberty and southeastern Harris Counties through 415 AM CDT... At 323 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Crosby to 7 miles east of Sargent. Movement was east at 35 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Pasadena, eastern Pearland, League City, Baytown, Galveston Causeway, Galveston Island West End, Texas City, Friendswood, La Porte, Deer Park, Lake Jackson, Alvin, Angleton, Dickinson, South Houston, La Marque, Santa Fe, Freeport, Seabrook and Clute. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 500 AM CDT for southeastern Texas.
